Vimeo Tools Folder Module

This module contains the class VimeoFolder, which represents a Vimeo folder (projects).

class vimeotools.vimeo_folder.VimeoFolder(connection, code_or_uri=None, name=None, description=None, privacy='nobody', users=[], parent_folder=None, password=None, sort='date', layout='grid', theme='standard')

Bases: VimeoItem, VimeoChild

  • privacy (Literal['anybody', 'nobody', 'password', 'users']) –

  • users (List[str]) –

  • parent_folder (Optional[Union[str, VimeoFolder]]) –

  • password (Optional[str]) –

  • sort (Literal['arrange', 'date', 'manual', 'name', 'plays', 'likes', 'comments', 'duration']) –

  • layout (Literal['grid', 'player']) –

  • theme (Literal['dark', 'standard']) –

remove_video(video)

Remove a video from the folder. :type video: Union[str, VimeoVideo] :param video: Union[str, VimeoVideo] :return: None

Note that this method does not delete the video from Vimeo.
